greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into parts each equal to 2 mod 7.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax=100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1-x^(7*k+2)),{k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 27 2015 *)
results.author: _Erich Friedman_, Aug 07 2005
ext: Changed offset to 0 and added a(0)=1 by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 27 2015
